verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came also unto me saying

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> tik-Kach Thou shalt not take לְךָ֖ le-Cha אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah; thee a wife וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor יִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu have לְךָ֙ le-Cha בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> ba-Nim neither shalt thou have sons וּבָנ֔וֹת <WH1323> u-va-Not, or daughters בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- For כֹ֣ה׀ <WH3541> choh thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning הַבָּנִים֙ <WH1121> hab-ba-Nim concerning the sons וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and concerning הַבָּנ֔וֹת <WH1323> hab-ba-Not, and concerning the daughters הַיִּלּוֹדִ֖ים <WH3205> hai-yil-lo-Dim that are born בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh; this וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- concerning אִמֹּתָ֞ם <WH517> 'im-mo-Tam and concerning their mothers הַיֹּלְד֣וֹת <WH3205> hai-yo-le-Dot that bare אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> o-Tam, וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- concerning אֲבוֹתָ֛ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam them and concerning their fathers הַמּוֹלִדִ֥ים <WH3205> ham-mo-li-Dim beget אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam בָּאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz them in this land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz-Zot. likewise

כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> choh thus אָמַ֜ר <WH559> 'a-Mar For thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni I am going מַשְׁבִּ֜ית <WH7673> mash-Bit Behold I will cause to cease מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom out of this place הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this לְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Chem in your eyes וּבִֽימֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3117> u-vi-mei-Chem; and in your days ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> sa-sOn of mirth וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the voice שִׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> sim-Chah, of gladness ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice חָתָ֖ן <WH2860> cha-Tan of the bridegroom וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the voice כַּלָּֽה׃ <WH3618> kal-Lah. of the bride
